Was more thinking how big the monitor actually was
It is only 100Hz, not 144, but that was my compromise for price.
I'm running 100Hz at the moment as well. That's as much as my poor old GPU can put out. As long as the response time is also nice and quick there shouldn't be any terrible ghosting.
I didn't want to spend that much, but I really wanted to try an ultrawide for once.
Moderate amounts of jelly. That's up there on the old wishlist. Report back with thoughts after a few months of usage!
not quite jealous considering my setup, but it's still better than any of the displays I have. Nicely purchased. :sparkles::ok_hand:
ultrawides are nice, i went back to normal widescreen though as it was a bit too large for my gaming needs.
UI stuff tends to get annoyingly far from the middle of the screen where the action is
Yeah, now I need to get a PC that can use this monitor. XD
It's so sad. 100hz, but I can only get 45fps on low.
I can imagine an ultrawide being super awesome for productivity though. Having all the editing tools and windows open in front with a full sized active preview off to one side on the same screen.
